Row.Field: Learning the fundamentals of SharePoint 2013 development.
Learn what you need to create apps on the SharePoint 2013 platform.
Learn how to create applications that communicate from SharePoint from outside the SharePoint environment. This includes applications that run exclusively in the browser or on external servers.
Learn how to create custom workflows to automate business processes in the new workflow engine in SharePoint 2013.
Learn how to create single page applications in the browser.
AngularJS: Browser-based Client Side Presentation Framework
Learn how to use the AngularJS presentation from Google to create client-side applications.
